subject: Mental Health
title: Workplace Anxiety
description: Learn Workplace Anxiety in one minute.

hook.text: Sunday evening dread is so common it has its own name: the Sunday scaries.

buildup.text: Workplace anxiety costs employers billions in lost productivity each year.

discovery.text: Open offices, constant emails, and unclear expectations fuel chronic unease.

twist.text: High performers often hide anxiety best, burning out behind a mask of success.

climax.text: Companies investing in mental health see lower turnover and absenteeism.

punchline.text: Productive and anxious are not opposites.

quiz.question: What are the 'Sunday scaries'?
options: Anxiety about the upcoming work week
